Edges-Loremaster -- Female Human Heroic Loremaster
Attributes (12 Points):
Agility: d4 Smarts: d12 Spirit: d6 Strength: d10 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Armor Interference: -4 Agility w/any armor or shield
Skills (16 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Battle: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d6 Survival: (sma) d4
Boating: (agi) d4 Occult: (sma) d12 Thievery: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d8 Persuasion: (spi) d4
Fighting: (agi) d4 Science: (sma) d4
Skill Notes:
Armor Interference: -4 Spellcasting and Agility-based skills w/any armor or shield
Bad Eyes+: -2 on visual trait rolls
Lore: May reroll Academics, Common Knowledge, Occult, and Science
Size: 0 Deity: Rovagug
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 12; Edge: 12; Skill: 4
Features
Edges (8 points): Loremaster II: 1; Loremaster III: 1; Loremaster: 1; New Powers: 1; Power Points: 3; Wizard: 1 Hindrances: Bad Eyes+; Loyal; Vengeful Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Bond: +1 Edge Points (Bonded Object or Familiar)
Loremaster II: Has Secret (Loremaster) feature
Loremaster III: Has Greater Lore feature
Loremaster: Has Lore feature
Wizard: Has Arcane Background (Wizard), Arcane Bond, Armor Interference, School, and Spellbook features
Loyal: Always takes risks for friends
School: May select specialist school (free casting reroll) and two opposition schools (-2 casting rolls)
Secret (Loremaster): May use chosen feature from core class
Vengeful: Seeks revenge legally
Combat
Parry: 6 (2) Cover: -4 Toughness: 10 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Leather Jacket Shield: Heavy Weapons: Light Crossbow (2d6 R10"); Long Bow (2d6 R15"); Starknife (d10+d4 R3"); Unarmed (d10+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +2 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Starknife Parry Modifier: +1 Parry when wielded
Arcana
Power Count: 7 Power Points: 25
Powers:
Barrier: (2 PP) R12" Creates a 5" long by 1" high wall for 5 rd
Mind Link: (1 PP) R12" Two targets communicate up to 1 mile telepathically (Raise 5 miles) for 30 min
Object Reading: (2 PP) RSelf Shows five yr of events that occurred w/in 10 yd of touched object (Raise 100 yr and 20 yd)
Sloth/Speed: (2 PP) R12" Target gains dbl Pace for 5 rd or suffers half pace (Spirit ends)
Slumber: (2 PP) R12" Target sleeps for 1 hr (Spirit neg)
Smite: (2 PP) R12" Target weapon inflicts +2 damage (Raise +4) for 5 rd
Teleport: (2 PP) R12" Target teleports 12" (Raise 24")
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Wizard): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
Greater Lore: +2 Power Count
New Powers: +2 Power Count
Power Points: +15 Power Points
Spellbook: Must study bonded arcane book daily to cast spells
